dataList.content: <This isn’t good. We’ve reached the top floor, but we don’t have nearly enough wishpower…>
Aah~ No worries. I’ve been itching to tell you this, and it’s finally time.
I actually pinched a little wishpower back at the pawnshop. It’s not a lot, but it should be just enough, right?
Rodya showed us a wish sticker sheet with a few labels left on it.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Why didn’t you tell us earlier?
Like you said, gambling is all about keeping a poker face. Wouldn’t want to see one of us slip and complicate things.
As for the boss role~ Mind if I borrow it for a sec, Dante?
I nodded, seeing as I wasn’t really doing much in this guise anyways.
Even if I were committed to the act, it would only be right for me to forfeit it with my knees bent, since things played out the way they did.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: …I would’ve been vehemently against this only hours ago. But now…
Good thinking. I’ve never lost once in anything where money was involved.
Alright…
The contestant enters~
Wait, I’m not the last? Aw, there goes my cool entry.
You are…?
My name’s Rodion. I’m here to gamble for the right to access the basement.
Pwfhah!
I was looking forward to finally meeting the infamous “wishpower whisker” in person, and look who we get instead. Aren’t you a little too confident for some unidentified stranger?
What a dull take~ It’s not who you are that matters in this world, right? It’s about who wins.
Well, you aren’t wrong there. The fact that you were able to get here is proof enough that you’re qualified.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: A pleasure. I’m Aida.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: And this is…

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Golly, my back’s hurtin’.
…A robot? No, a prosthetic…?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: What’s that stare? Never seen a full-body prosthetic before?
Isn’t that model… a bit too antiquated? It kinda looks like it belongs in a museum.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Old is gold, as they say. Patched it up a few times, and now it’s sturdier than most new ones.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Why’s that boy bein’ so sluggish about comin’ here anyway? Arrogant brat thinks he can show up late to serious business, eh?
Pardon me. I had an urgent matter.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: You think the world revolves around you, Sonya? Do you crave attention so much that you have to arrive late and be showered in glares?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Haha, I didn’t mean to. If anything, you’d fit better as the protagonist of life, Aida.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: It’s been a while, Rodya.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: What’s up? You two know each other?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Let’s say that we… share a hometown. Isn’t that right, Rodya?
So, are you… still leading the Yurodiviye, then?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Dunno, it might be too early to say “still”… You were the one who left on your own just like that.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Now now, that’s enough chatting. Since we have all the players, let’s go over the rules again.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: The four bidders for the casino are all here: Sonya, Aida, the Tieqiu, and… representing the Tingtang Gang’s boss… a suspicious yet shameless stand-in…

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: No cheats or sleights of hand are allowed during the game. The moment you’re spotted in the act, you’re out.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: It should go without saying that anything involving wishpower is forbidden as well.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Soon as you’re caught, you’re on the choppin’ block! You’ll sorely regret it!

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: We’ll play three games in total, and the one with the most chips wins. Simple enough?

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: The winner will get to take the elevator to the underground portion where the Golden Bough is.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: It’s the treasure the former owner of this casino was so desperate to claim, digging a whole tunnel to unearth it.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: But then they suddenly croaked for reasons unknown, making us the “lucky” bidders…
…What an elegant way to put that they died under shady circumstances.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Haha, oh Rodya. You’re still as cynical as ever, huh?
…Shut it. How do you guys all know about the Golden Bough, though? Didn’t think it would be so widely known to the public.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Any Syndicate worth its name has caught wind of the stories. Those about the Golden Bough buried down here… and the riches and fame it’ll bring to the owner.
If that’s the case, seems someone has gained an interest for worldly luxuries, huh? I thought you warned me to stay away from those things, Sonya.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: The Golden Bough can be used to achieve far greater things, Rodya. My purpose has stayed the same. To destroy the system of oppression and exploitation, preventing the concentration of wealth…

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Yeesh, there he goes again with the grand words. Someone stop ‘im.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: My apologies. It reminded me of the old times.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: It’s funny. I used to keep you from your obsession with gambling and money.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Yet here we are at the same table, keeping our hands of cards from each other in a gamble with our goals on the line.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: What is your goal?
…To win.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: …Of course.
